description:
As a poker platform administrator
  I want automatic phase transitions when betting rounds are complete
  So that games flow seamlessly without manual intervention

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Auto Completion Test Table" with 6 seats
I create test players "AutoPlayer1,AutoPlayer2,AutoPlayer3" with 500 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "AutoPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"AutoPlayer2" (first to act) performs "call" action
"AutoPlayer3" performs "call" action
"AutoPlayer1" performs "check" action
the preflop betting round should be automatically complete
the phase should automatically transition to "flop"
I should see 3 community cards dealt automatically
I should receive automatic phase transition event "automaticFlop"
the system message should show "ðŸŽ´ Automatic Flop: 3 community cards dealt (betting round completed)"

elements.name: Automatic Flop to Turn Transition with All Players Checking

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Auto Completion Test Table" with 6 seats
I create test players "CheckPlayer1,CheckPlayer2,CheckPlayer3" with 400 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts and reaches flop phase
the flop betting round begins
"CheckPlayer2" (first to act) performs "check" action
"CheckPlayer3" performs "check" action
"CheckPlayer1" performs "check" action
the flop betting round should be automatically complete
the phase should automatically transition to "turn"
I should see 4 community cards displayed automatically
I should receive automatic phase transition event "automaticTurn"
the turn order should reset for the new betting round

elements.name: Automatic Turn to River Transition with Betting Activity

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Auto Completion Test Table" with 6 seats
I create test players "TurnPlayer1,TurnPlayer2,TurnPlayer3" with 300 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts and reaches turn phase
the turn betting round begins
"TurnPlayer2" (first to act) performs "bet" action with amount "50"
"TurnPlayer3" performs "call" action with amount "50"
"TurnPlayer1" performs "fold" action
the turn betting round should be automatically complete
the phase should automatically transition to "river"
I should see 5 community cards displayed automatically
I should receive automatic phase transition event "automaticRiver"
only 2 players should remain active
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Auto Completion Test Table" with 6 seats
I create test players "RiverPlayer1,RiverPlayer2" with 250 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2"
the game starts and reaches river phase
the river betting round begins
"RiverPlayer2" (first to act) performs "check" action
"RiverPlayer1" performs "check" action
the river betting round should be automatically complete
the phase should automatically transition to "showdown"
I should receive automatic phase transition event "automaticShowdown"
the showdown should determine winner automatically
I should receive game completion event "gameComplete"

elements.name: Automatic Phase Transition with All-In Players

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Auto Completion Test Table" with 6 seats
I create test players "AllInPlayer1,AllInPlayer2,AllInPlayer3" with 100 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "AllInPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"AllInPlayer2" (first to act) performs "allIn" action
"AllInPlayer3" performs "allIn" action
"AllInPlayer1" performs "call" action
the preflop betting round should be automatically complete
all remaining phases should automatically advance
I should see community cards dealt for flop, turn, and river
the game should automatically reach showdown
the pot should be distributed to the winner automatically

elements.name: Betting Round Completion with Mixed All-In and Active Players

I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Auto Completion Test Table" with 6 seats

all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3,4"

"MixedPlayer2" (first to act) performs "allIn" action with all chips
"MixedPlayer3" performs "call" action

"MixedPlayer1" performs "call" action

the phase should automatically transition to "flop"

all players join the test table and take seats "1,2"
the game starts with "WSPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins

"WSPlayer1" performs "check" action

the phase transitions to turn automatically

I create test players "CompPlayer1,CompPlayer2,CompPlayer3" with 75 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "CompPlayer1" as dealer
all players go all-in during preflop

name: Automated Betting Round Completion Logic

description:
As a poker player
  I want to verify the integrity of card shuffling
  So that I can trust the fairness of the game

elements.name: Generate and display card order hash before game starts

steps.name: the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
I start a new poker game
a card order hash should be generated before dealing
the hash should be displayed to all players
the card order should be stored in the database
the card order should initially be unrevealed
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
there are multiple completed games with card orders
I request the latest card orders via API
I should receive up to 10 card order records
each record should contain game ID, hash, and reveal status
revealed records should include the actual card order
unrevealed records should hide the card order details
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
there are completed games with revealed card orders
I request to download the card order history
I should receive a CSV file with card order data
the CSV should contain game ID, hash, seed, and card sequence
only revealed card orders should be included in the download
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
a game has been completed with revealed card order
I verify the card order using the original hash
the verification should confirm the card order is authentic
the computed hash should match the stored hash
the card sequence should be verifiable against the seed

elements.name: Automatic card order reveal after game completion

steps.name: the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
I have 2 players already seated:
the game starts and progresses to completion
the card order should be automatically revealed
players should be notified of the card order revelation
the card order should become publicly viewable
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
a game has been completed with revealed card order
I attempt to verify with an incorrect hash
the verification should fail
the system should indicate hash mismatch
the actual vs expected hashes should be shown
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
a specific seed is used for card shuffling
the same seed is used to regenerate the deck
the card order should be identical
the hash should match the original
the shuffle should be reproducible
the card order transparency system is enabled
I am directly on the game page with test data
the poker system is running
I access the card order transparency endpoints
I should be able to get latest card orders
I should be able to get card orders by game ID
I should be able to download card order history
I should be able to verify card order hashes
all endpoints should return proper error handling

name: Comprehensive Poker Actions Testing

description:
As a poker platform administrator
  I want a professional blind system with tournament schedules, dead blind rules, and late entry logic
  So that the platform supports professional poker tournaments and cash games

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Enhanced Blind Test Table" with 8 seats
I create a tournament blind schedule:
I create test players "TourneyPlayer1,TourneyPlayer2,TourneyPlayer3" with 1500 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
I initialize the tournament with the blind schedule
the game starts with the tournament schedule
the current blind level should be 1
the small blind should be 25
the big blind should be 50
the ante should be 0
the blind level timer should be running
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Enhanced Blind Test Table" with 8 seats
I have an active tournament with blind schedule
the current blind level is 1 with blinds "25/50"
the blind level duration has elapsed
the system checks for blind level increase
the blind level should increase to 2
the small blind should be 50
the big blind should be 100
the ante should be 10
all active players should post the ante
the new blind level timer should start

elements.name: Dead Blind Rules for Seat Changes

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Enhanced Blind Test Table" with 8 seats
I create test players "SeatChangePlayer1,SeatChangePlayer2,SeatChangePlayer3" with 1000 chips each

the game starts with "SeatChangePlayer1" as dealer

the seat change moves the player past the blind positions
"SeatChangePlayer3" should have a dead blind obligation
the dead blind type should be "both"
the dead blind reason should be "seat_change"
the next hand begins
"SeatChangePlayer3" should be required to post dead blinds
the dead blind amount should be posted to the pot

the current dealer is in seat 2
"LateEntryPlayer" joins the game in seat 6
the seat is after the current blind positions
"LateEntryPlayer" should have a late entry dead blind obligation
the dead blind type should be "big"
the dead blind reason should be "late_entry"
"LateEntryPlayer" is dealt into the next hand
they should post a dead big blind before receiving cards
their chip count should decrease by the big blind amount
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Enhanced Blind Test Table" with 8 seats

the dead blind reason should be "late_entry"

no additional dead blind should be required

the break period ends

normal gameplay should resume
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby

I create test players "AllInPlayer1,AllInPlayer2" with chips "15,1000"
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2"

name: Enhanced Blind System

description:
As a poker platform user
  I want my game state to be preserved and restored automatically
  So that I can reconnect seamlessly after disconnections or browser refreshes

elements.name: Game State Auto-Save During Active Play

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have an active poker game "PersistenceGame1" with 3 players
the game progresses through multiple betting actions:
the game state should be automatically saved to database
the saved game state should include all player actions
the saved game state should include current pot amount
the saved game state should include current phase "preflop"
the auto-save timestamp should be within the last 10 seconds

elements.name: Complete Game State Restoration After Server Restart

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have an active poker game "PersistenceGame2" with game state saved
the game has progressed to the "flop" phase with 3 community cards
the pot contains 150 chips from previous betting
the server is restarted or the game is restored
the game state should be fully restored from database
all players should have their correct chip counts
all community cards should be restored in correct order
the current phase should be "flop"
the pot amount should be exactly 150 chips
the current player turn should be preserved
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have a registered user "SessionUser1"
"SessionUser1" joins game "SessionGame1" as "SessionPlayer1"
a player session should be created in database
the session should include user ID, game ID, and player ID
the session should have a unique reconnect token
the session status should be "connected"
the session should be marked as active
a connection log entry should be recorded
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have user "RefreshUser" actively playing in game "RefreshGame"
"RefreshUser" has placed bets and is in the middle of a hand
"RefreshUser" refreshes their browser page
the user should be automatically reconnected to the game
their game state should be fully restored
they should see their current cards (if any)
they should see the correct community cards
they should see accurate chip counts for all players
they should be able to continue playing immediately
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have user "DisconnectUser" in an active game "DisconnectGame"
the user is in the middle of a betting round
"DisconnectUser" loses network connection for 30 seconds
their WebSocket connection drops
the session should be marked as disconnected in database
a disconnection log should be recorded
the network connection is restored
"DisconnectUser" attempts to reconnect
the reconnection should be successful using their reconnect token
they should receive the current game state
they should see any actions that occurred while disconnected
they should be able to resume playing
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have user "TimeoutUser" in game "TimeoutGame"
"TimeoutUser" disconnects and doesn't reconnect for 15 minutes
the session should be marked as timed out
the user should be removed from active play
other players should be notified of the timeout
the game should continue with remaining players
a timeout log entry should be recorded
"TimeoutUser" tries to reconnect after timeout
they should be able to rejoin as a spectator
they should NOT be able to rejoin the active hand
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have a game "MultiDisconnectGame" with 5 active players
3 players disconnect simultaneously due to network issues
all 3 disconnections should be handled independently
each player's session should be preserved separately
the game should pause automatically for missing players
the first player reconnects
they should be restored to their exact position
the second and third players reconnect
the game should resume automatically with all players
all players should have consistent game state

elements.name: Game Action History Recording and Replay

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have game "HistoryGame" with multiple hands played
players perform the following sequence of actions:
all actions should be recorded in the action history
each action should have correct sequence numbers
each action should include player name and timestamp
the action history should be retrievable by hand number
the complete game replay should be available
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have user "SecureUser" with an active session in "SecureGame"
"SecureUser" disconnects and receives a reconnect token
the reconnect token should be cryptographically secure
the token should be unique to the user and game
"SecureUser" attempts to reconnect with the correct token
the reconnection should be successful
an attacker attempts to use an invalid token
the reconnection should be rejected
a security log entry should be recorded
"SecureUser" reconnects, their token should be regenerated

elements.name: Game State Persistence During Phase Transitions

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have game "TransitionGame" in the middle of a betting round
the betting round completes and transitions to the next phase
the server automatically deals community cards
the game state should be saved after each phase transition
the community cards should be persisted correctly
the phase change should be recorded in action history
the pot amount should be accurately preserved
any player reconnects during or after the transition
they should see the correct new phase and community cards

elements.name: Connection Quality Monitoring and Adaptive Timeouts

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have user "QualityUser" with varying connection quality
"QualityUser" has multiple brief disconnections (< 30 seconds each)
the session timeout should be extended adaptively
the user should not be removed from the game
"QualityUser" has a stable connection for 5 minutes
the timeout should return to normal duration
connection quality metrics should be recorded
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have user "CrossDeviceUser" playing on desktop in "CrossDeviceGame"
"CrossDeviceUser" opens the game on their mobile device
they should be offered to take over the session
they confirm the session takeover
the desktop session should be gracefully disconnected
the mobile session should become the active session
the game state should transfer seamlessly
other players should see no interruption
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have game "EmergencyGame" with active players and significant pot
an emergency server maintenance is required
the game should be automatically suspended with notification
the complete game state should be saved immediately
all players should receive suspension notification
the server maintenance is complete
all suspended games should be automatically restored
players should be notified when their games are available
they should be able to resume exactly where they left off
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
I have game "IntegrityGame" with complex game state
multiple simultaneous updates occur (player actions + auto-save)
all database operations should be atomic
the game state should never be in an inconsistent state
if a save operation fails partway through
the entire transaction should be rolled back
the previous consistent state should be preserved
error recovery should be automatic
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the game persistence system is initialized
I am in the game lobby
the system has been running for several days
there are many inactive sessions and old action histories
the automatic cleanup process runs
sessions older than 24 hours should be removed
action histories older than 30 days should be archived
the cleanup should not affect active games
system performance should be maintained
cleanup statistics should be logged for monitoring

name: Game Persistence and Reconnection System

name: Multiplayer Poker Game Round

description:
As a poker platform administrator
  I want to ensure strict turn order enforcement with professional out-of-turn action rejection
  So that the game maintains integrity and follows official Texas Hold'em rules

elements.name: Strict Turn Order Validation in Preflop Betting

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "TurnPlayer1,TurnPlayer2,TurnPlayer3" with 500 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "TurnPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"TurnPlayer3" should be first to act (left of big blind)
"TurnPlayer1" attempts to "call" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently TurnPlayer3's turn to act"
"TurnPlayer1" action should be rejected
the current player should still be "TurnPlayer3"

elements.name: Out-of-Turn Action Rejection with Professional Error Messages

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "OrderPlayer1,OrderPlayer2,OrderPlayer3,OrderPlayer4" with 400 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3,4"
the game starts with "OrderPlayer2" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"OrderPlayer4" should be first to act
"OrderPlayer1" attempts to "bet" with amount "50" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently OrderPlayer4's turn to act"
"OrderPlayer2" attempts to "raise" to "100" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently OrderPlayer4's turn to act"
"OrderPlayer3" attempts to "fold" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently OrderPlayer4's turn to act"
the current player should still be "OrderPlayer4"
no out-of-turn actions should have been processed

elements.name: Turn Order Enforcement During Flop Betting

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "FlopPlayer1,FlopPlayer2,FlopPlayer3" with 300 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts and completes preflop betting
the flop is dealt
the flop betting round begins
"FlopPlayer2" should be first to act (left of dealer)
"FlopPlayer3" attempts to "check" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently FlopPlayer2's turn to act"
"FlopPlayer1" attempts to "bet" with amount "30" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently FlopPlayer2's turn to act"
the current player should still be "FlopPlayer2"
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "FoldPlayer1,FoldPlayer2,FoldPlayer3,FoldPlayer4" with 250 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3,4"
the game starts with "FoldPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"FoldPlayer2" (first to act) performs "fold"
the turn should move to "FoldPlayer3"
"FoldPlayer2" attempts to "call" (after folding)
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot perform call: you have folded and are no longer active"
"FoldPlayer1" attempts to "raise" to "80" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently FoldPlayer3's turn to act"
the current player should still be "FoldPlayer3"

elements.name: Turn Order Enforcement with All-In Players

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "AllInPlayer1,AllInPlayer2,AllInPlayer3" with 100 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "AllInPlayer3" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"AllInPlayer2" (first to act) performs "allIn"
the turn should move to "AllInPlayer3"
"AllInPlayer2" attempts to "bet" after going all-in
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot perform bet: you have folded and are no longer active"
"AllInPlayer1" attempts to "call" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently AllInPlayer3's turn to act"
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "ValidPlayer1,ValidPlayer2" with 200 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2"
the game starts with "ValidPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"ValidPlayer2" (big blind) checks when they should call
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot check: there is a bet of 5 to call"
"ValidPlayer2" performs "call" correctly
the turn moves to "ValidPlayer1"
"ValidPlayer1" attempts to "call" when no bet exists
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot call: no bet to call. Use check instead"

elements.name: Turn Order During Multiple Betting Rounds

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "RoundPlayer1,RoundPlayer2,RoundPlayer3" with 500 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game progresses through preflop, flop, and turn phases
the river betting round begins
"RoundPlayer2" should be first to act (left of dealer)
"RoundPlayer3" attempts to "bet" with amount "100" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently RoundPlayer2's turn to act"
"RoundPlayer1" attempts to "check" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error "OUT OF TURN: It is currently RoundPlayer2's turn to act"
the current player should remain "RoundPlayer2"

elements.name: Turn Order Enforcement During Showdown Phase

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "ShowdownPlayer1,ShowdownPlayer2" with 300 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2"
the game reaches showdown phase
"ShowdownPlayer1" attempts to "bet" with amount "50"
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot perform bet: hand is showdown"
"ShowdownPlayer2" attempts to "fold"
I should see turn order violation error "Cannot perform fold: hand is showdown"

elements.name: Turn Order Validation Error Messages Include Player Names

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "NamedPlayer1,NamedPlayer2,NamedPlayer3" with 400 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "NamedPlayer2" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"NamedPlayer1" should be first to act
"NamedPlayer2" attempts to "call" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error containing "It is currently NamedPlayer1's turn to act"
"NamedPlayer3" attempts to "raise" to "75" out of turn
I should see turn order violation error containing "It is currently NamedPlayer1's turn to act"

elements.name: Turn Order Recovery After Invalid Attempts

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
I am in the game lobby
there is a test table "Turn Order Test Table" with 5 seats
I create test players "RecoveryPlayer1,RecoveryPlayer2,RecoveryPlayer3" with 350 chips each
all players join the test table and take seats "1,2,3"
the game starts with "RecoveryPlayer1" as dealer
the preflop betting round begins
"RecoveryPlayer3" attempts multiple out-of-turn actions
all out-of-turn attempts should be rejected
the current player should remain "RecoveryPlayer2"
"RecoveryPlayer2" performs "call" correctly
the turn should properly advance to "RecoveryPlayer3"
the game should continue normally

name: Professional Turn Order Enforcement

description:
As a poker platform administrator
  I want a comprehensive user role management system with permissions and moderation
  So that I can properly manage users, enforce rules, and maintain platform security

elements.name: User Registration with Default Role Assignment

steps.name: the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I register a new user "NewPlayer" with password "password123"
the registration is successful
"NewPlayer" should be assigned the "player" role by default
"NewPlayer" should have "join_game" permission
"NewPlayer" should have "place_bet" permission
"NewPlayer" should have "chat_message" permission
"NewPlayer" should NOT have "warn_player" permission
"NewPlayer" should NOT have "ban_user" permission
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have test users with different roles:
I check permissions for each user
"TestPlayer" should have permissions: "join_game,place_bet,chat_message"
"TestMod" should have permissions: "join_game,place_bet,chat_message,warn_player,kick_player"
"TestAdmin" should have permissions: "join_game,place_bet,chat_message,warn_player,kick_player,ban_user"
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I create test players "RegularPlayer,ModeratorUser" with roles "player,moderator"
both users are logged into the system
"RegularPlayer" attempts to kick another player
the action should be rejected with "Insufficient permissions"
"ModeratorUser" attempts to kick another player
the action should be successful
a moderation record should be created
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have an administrator "AdminUser" and a player "TargetPlayer"
"AdminUser" is logged into the system
"AdminUser" assigns "TargetPlayer" the role "moderator"
"TargetPlayer" should have the "moderator" role
"TargetPlayer" should gain "warn_player" permission
"TargetPlayer" should gain "kick_player" permission
the role change should be logged in the system
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have a moderator "ModUser" and a player "TargetUser"
both users are in the same poker game
"ModUser" issues a warning to "TargetUser" with reason "Inappropriate chat"
a moderation action record should be created
the action type should be "warn"
the reason should be "Inappropriate chat"
"TargetUser" should receive a warning notification
the moderation should appear in "TargetUser" moderation history
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have a moderator "ModUser" and a player "DisruptivePlayer"
"DisruptivePlayer" is in a poker game
"ModUser" kicks "DisruptivePlayer" with reason "Disruptive behavior"
"DisruptivePlayer" should be removed from the game
a kick moderation record should be created
"DisruptivePlayer" should be notified about the kick
other players should see a system message about the kick
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have an administrator "AdminUser" and a player "ProblematicUser"
"AdminUser" bans "ProblematicUser" with reason "Repeated violations"
"ProblematicUser" should be marked as banned in the database
"ProblematicUser" should be set to inactive
a ban moderation record should be created
"ProblematicUser" attempts to login
the login should be rejected with "Account is banned"
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have a moderator "TempModUser" and a player "TempTargetUser"
"TempModUser" mutes "TempTargetUser" for 30 minutes with reason "Spam"
a mute moderation record should be created with 30 minute duration
the expiration time should be set correctly
"TempTargetUser" should be prevented from chatting
30 minutes pass
the mute should automatically expire
"TempTargetUser" should be able to chat again
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have users with different roles:
"Player1" attempts to moderate "Moderator1"
the action should be rejected due to insufficient role level
"Moderator1" attempts to ban "Admin1"
the action should be rejected due to insufficient role level
"Admin1" moderates "Moderator1"
the action should be successful
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have a moderator "AuditMod" and a player "HistoryPlayer"
"AuditMod" performs the following actions on "HistoryPlayer":
"HistoryPlayer" should have 3 moderation records
the moderation history should show all actions in chronological order
each record should include moderator information and timestamps
the audit trail should be accessible to administrators
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have a player "StatusPlayer" with active moderations
"StatusPlayer" has an active mute for 60 minutes
"StatusPlayer" has an expired warning from yesterday
I check "StatusPlayer" active moderations
only the active mute should be returned
the expired warning should not be included
the remaining mute time should be calculated correctly
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have users with different roles logged into the frontend
"player" role user views the interface
they should see standard game controls
they should NOT see moderation controls
they should NOT see admin panel access
"moderator" role user views the interface
they should see standard game controls
they should see moderation controls
they should NOT see admin panel access
"administrator" role user views the interface
they should see all game controls
they should see all moderation controls
they should see admin panel access
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have a banned user "BannedUser"
"BannedUser" attempts to join a poker game
the action should be rejected
"BannedUser" attempts to send a chat message
the action should be rejected
"BannedUser" attempts to access any game feature
all actions should be rejected with appropriate messages
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have a user "InfoUser" with role "moderator"
I request user role information for "InfoUser"
the response should include role name "moderator"
the response should include role display name "Moderator"
the response should include role level 50
the response should include all assigned permissions
the response should include user status information
the server is running on "http://localhost:8080"
the role system is initialized with default roles and permissions
I am in the game lobby
I have an administrator "MassAdmin"
"MassAdmin" requests all users with their roles
the response should include all users in the system
each user should have complete role information
the list should be properly paginated
the response should include user status and ban information
the data should be sorted by registration date

name: User Role Management System
